title: Construction of new hospital wing
description_raw:
TENDER NOTICE - Construction and Development Project

The Oslo University Hospital invites tenders for the construction and development of a modern hospital wing with state-of-the-art medical facilities. The project includes:

1. Operating rooms with advanced surgical equipment
2. Patient wards with modern amenities
3. Diagnostic equipment areas
4. Support facilities and infrastructure

Contractors must demonstrate experience in healthcare facility construction and meet all regulatory requirements.
description_excerpt: Construction and development of modern hospital wing with medical facilities, operating rooms, patient wards, and diagnostic equipment areas.

title: IT Infrastructure Upgrade
description_raw:
REQUEST FOR PROPOSALS - IT Infrastructure Modernization

The Norwegian Government IT Services seeks proposals for supply and installation of comprehensive network infrastructure, servers, and cloud computing solutions for government offices.

Scope includes:
- Data center equipment and infrastructure
- Networking hardware (switches, routers, firewalls)
- Cloud migration and integration services
- 24/7 support and maintenance

Bidders must have proven track record in large-scale IT deployments.
description_excerpt: Supply and installation of network infrastructure, servers, and cloud computing solutions for government offices including data center equipment and networking hardware.

title: Road Maintenance Services
description_raw:
ANNUAL CONTRACT - Road Maintenance and Winter Services

Oslo Municipality Public Works Department requires comprehensive road maintenance services covering:

- Asphalt repair and resurfacing
- Pothole filling and preventive maintenance
- Road line marking and signage
- Winter maintenance (snow removal, de-icing)
- Emergency response services

The contract covers approximately 500km of municipal roads. Service level agreements apply.
description_excerpt: Annual road maintenance covering asphalt repair, pothole filling, line marking, and winter maintenance for municipal roads.

title: Medical Equipment Supply
description_raw:
FRAMEWORK AGREEMENT - Medical Diagnostic Equipment

The Regional Health Authority South-East invites tenders for procurement of advanced diagnostic medical equipment for regional hospitals:

- MRI machines (3T and 1.5T)
- CT scanners with latest imaging technology
- Ultrasound devices for various applications
- Laboratory testing equipment
- Installation, training, and maintenance included

Equipment must meet CE certification and Norwegian health regulations.
description_excerpt: Procurement of diagnostic medical equipment including MRI machines, CT scanners, ultrasound devices, and laboratory testing equipment for regional hospitals.

title: Office Furniture and Equipment
description_raw:
TENDER - Office Furniture and Equipment Supply

The Ministry of Finance requires complete office furnishing for new government building complex:

- Ergonomic office furniture (desks, chairs)
- Filing cabinets and storage solutions
- Conference room furniture
- Reception area furnishings
- Office equipment and accessories

All furniture must meet environmental and ergonomic standards. Delivery and installation included.
description_excerpt: Supply of ergonomic office furniture, desks, chairs, filing cabinets, and office equipment for new government building complex.

title: Software Development Services
description_raw:
REQUEST FOR PROPOSALS - Custom Software Development

Digital Norway Agency seeks development partner for citizen services portal project:

- Web application development (responsive design)
- Mobile app creation (iOS and Android)
- API integration with existing government systems
- Security and compliance implementation
- User experience design
- Testing and quality assurance
- Documentation and training

Agile development methodology required. Must comply with WCAG 2.1 accessibility standards.
description_excerpt: Custom software development for citizen services portal including web application development, mobile app creation, and API integration services.

title: Building Renovation Project
description_raw:
MAJOR RENOVATION - Historic Municipal Building

Bergen City Council invites tenders for complete renovation of historic municipal building (built 1885):

- Structural repairs and foundation work
- Electrical system upgrades to modern standards
- Plumbing improvements and new HVAC
- Interior refurbishment preserving historic features
- Accessibility improvements
- Energy efficiency measures

Contractors must have heritage building experience. All work subject to cultural heritage regulations.
description_excerpt: Complete renovation of historic municipal building including structural repairs, electrical system upgrades, plumbing improvements, and interior refurbishment.

title: Cleaning Services Contract
description_raw:
SERVICE CONTRACT - Cleaning and Maintenance Services

Norwegian State Properties requires daily cleaning and maintenance services for government office buildings (total 50,000 mÂ²):

- Daily office cleaning
- Floor care and maintenance
- Waste management and recycling
- Sanitation services
- Window cleaning (quarterly)
- Deep cleaning services
- Green cleaning products required

Service level agreements with performance metrics apply.
description_excerpt: Daily cleaning and maintenance services for government office buildings including floor care, waste management, and sanitation services.

title: Vehicle Fleet Procurement
description_raw:
VEHICLE PROCUREMENT - Electric and Hybrid Fleet

Trondheim Municipality seeks to purchase electric and hybrid vehicles for municipal fleet replacement:

- Electric passenger cars (25 units)
- Hybrid vans (15 units)
- Light commercial electric vehicles (10 units)
- Charging infrastructure and installation
- Maintenance contracts
- Driver training for electric vehicles

All vehicles must meet Norwegian emission standards and have minimum 300km range.
description_excerpt: Purchase of electric and hybrid vehicles for municipal fleet including passenger cars, vans, and light commercial vehicles with charging infrastructure.

title: Consulting Services for Digital Transformation
description_raw:
CONSULTING SERVICES - Digital Transformation Strategy

Innovation Norway seeks strategic consulting services for comprehensive digital transformation program:

- Digital transformation strategy development
- Business process optimization and re-engineering
- Change management and organizational development
- Technology assessment and roadmap
- Implementation support
- Training and capability building
- Performance measurement framework

Consultants must demonstrate public sector experience and proven digital transformation track record.
description_excerpt: Strategic consulting services for digital transformation initiatives, business process optimization, and change management for public sector organizations.
